title: James the 2nd.
content: Just out of nowhere and it might mean not much to most but... so often when I start reading a Typophile topic, James Pucket made a first (not often easy) comment. Just want to say that's very much appreciated.
author: Jos Buivenga

comments.content: It’s because I enjoy being wrong :)
And see ? He just did it again :-)
... fourth smiley in a row, but it \*did\* made me laugh :-)
I enjoy having someone be the scapegoat :)
